title: Zhege Nianji Huan Neng Dang Daxia Ma 2nd Season

alternative_titles.ja: 这个年纪还能当大侠吗 第二季

synopsis:
Old Bai (Flying Swordsman), 35, owned Chang'an Supermarket, which was originally the only commercial establishment in the neighborhood. However, the well-known chain supermarket Wow moved in, and to protect his store, Old Bai, his wife Yanzi (Yan Shanxue), and a group of neighbors and friends pulled out all the stops to fight the conglomerate and make money...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
